description: This recipe, from Julie Reiner of the Clover Club in Brooklyn, is a bourbon Manhattan, sweetened up with apricot and smoothed out with vermouth It’s a strong one, and it goes down easily (The New York Times)
title: The Southern Slope
title_page: The Southern Slope Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This recipe, from Julie Reiner of the Clover Club in Brooklyn, is a bourbon Manhattan, sweetened up with apricot and smoothed out with vermouth. It’s a strong one, and it goes down easily. (The New York Times)
Featured in: Make Mine Manhattan.
Learn: How to Make Cocktails
